Transcription for 13113

This must have been in the mid-70s, and he said to Mary, his wife, we are going there
to start a business.
So he went there and opened up this shop in what later became Swellen Street, whether
it was named after him, I never discovered, but...
And there they opened the shop and worked very hard.
I do remember my mother telling me that the first few weeks were dreadful.
They had no response at all.
Hardly anyone came into the shop or anything like that.
And then suddenly they started coming and it opened up.
